events.name: Ukraine secures release of 144 soldiers
events.wd_description: Ukraine secured the release of 144 soldiers, including 95 who defended the Azovstal steelworks in Mariupol, in the largest exchange of the crisis, while 144 Russian and separatist soldiers were returned to Russia.
events.description: Ukraine secured the release of 144 soldiers, including 95 who defended the Azovstal steelworks in Mariupol, in the largest exchange of the crisis, while 144 Russian and separatist soldiers were returned to Russia.

events.name: Details of the prisoner swap
events.wd_description: 144 Ukrainian soldiers were exchanged for 144 Russian and separatist soldiers, verified by a pro-Russian separatist leader.
events.description: 144 Ukrainian soldiers were exchanged for 144 Russian and separatist soldiers, verified by a pro-Russian separatist leader.

events.name: Political reactions in Russia
events.wd_description: Following the seizure of the Azov men, many Russian politicians advocated for their trial and death, with some members of the State Duma planning to introduce legislation to disrupt prisoner swaps involving fighters deemed "terrorists."
events.description: Following the seizure of the Azov men, many Russian politicians advocated for their trial and death, with some members of the State Duma planning to introduce legislation to disrupt prisoner swaps involving fighters deemed "terrorists."

events.name: Fate of Azovstal defenders
events.wd_description: More than a thousand Azovstal defenders who surrendered were moved to Russian-held territory in May, causing major concern for Kyiv's leaders who sought a prisoner swap.
events.description: More than a thousand Azovstal defenders who surrendered were moved to Russian-held territory in May, causing major concern for Kyiv's leaders who sought a prisoner swap.

events.name: Reactions to the exchange
events.wd_description: Some Russian military bloggers and pro-war politicians reacted negatively to the exchange plan, but Moscow did not respond to the prisoner swap.
events.description: Some Russian military bloggers and pro-war politicians reacted negatively to the exchange plan, but Moscow did not respond to the prisoner swap.

events.name: Drone attack on Russian oil refinery
events.wd_label: Drone attack on Russian oil refinery
events.wd_description: Dramatic footage emerged of a drone crashing into the Novoshakhtinsk oil refinery in Rostov, causing a fiery explosion in what appears to be an attack inside Russia's borders.
events.description: Dramatic footage emerged of a drone crashing into the Novoshakhtinsk oil refinery in Rostov, causing a fiery explosion in what appears to be an attack inside Russia's borders.

events.name: Details of the attack
events.wd_description: The drone crashed into the oil refinery, potentially breaching Russia's air defense. Ukraine has not claimed responsibility for the attack.
events.description: The drone crashed into the oil refinery, potentially breaching Russia's air defense. Ukraine has not claimed responsibility for the attack.

events.name: Implications of the attack
events.wd_description: If confirmed, the drone was either launched from within Russia or passed through Russian-controlled territory, evading Russian air defense systems.
events.description: If confirmed, the drone was either launched from within Russia or passed through Russian-controlled territory, evading Russian air defense systems.

events.name: Impact on refinery operations
events.wd_description: No one was hurt in the incident, but the refinery has ceased operations pending repairs.
events.description: No one was hurt in the incident, but the refinery has ceased operations pending repairs.

events.name: Explosions in Kyiv following Sievierodonetsk counter-offensive
events.wd_label: Explosions in Kyiv following Sievierodonetsk counter-offensive
events.wd_description: Several explosions rocked Kyiv early Sunday after Ukrainian troops recaptured the eastern battlefield city of Sievierodonetsk in a counter-offensive against Russia.
events.description: Several explosions rocked Kyiv early Sunday after Ukrainian troops recaptured the eastern battlefield city of Sievierodonetsk in a counter-offensive against Russia.

events.name: Kyiv explosions
events.wd_description: Explosions in Kyiv resulted in at least one hospitalization with no reported deaths, with the railway network appearing to be the target.
events.description: Explosions in Kyiv resulted in at least one hospitalization with no reported deaths, with the railway network appearing to be the target.

events.name: Sievierodonetsk counter-offensive
events.wd_description: Ukrainian forces recaptured about half of Sievierodonetsk from Russian troops, according to the governor of the Luhansk region.
events.description: Ukrainian forces recaptured about half of Sievierodonetsk from Russian troops, according to the governor of the Luhansk region.

events.name: Situation in Sievierodonetsk
events.wd_description: Mayor Oleksandr Stryuk described the situation as tense and complicated, with Ukrainian military efforts focused on driving the enemy out of the city.
events.description: Mayor Oleksandr Stryuk described the situation as tense and complicated, with Ukrainian military efforts focused on driving the enemy out of the city.

events.name: Russia cuts natural gas supplies
events.wd_description: Russia will cut natural gas supplies to Poland and Bulgaria after they refused to pay in rubles, escalating tensions with the West.
events.description: Russia will cut natural gas supplies to Poland and Bulgaria after they refused to pay in rubles, escalating tensions with the West.

events.name: PGNiG statement
events.wd_description: PGNiG, Poland's state-run gas company, stated that Gazprom informed it on April 26 of the decision to fully suspend deliveries under the Yamal contract starting April 27.
events.description: PGNiG, Poland's state-run gas company, stated that Gazprom informed it on April 26 of the decision to fully suspend deliveries under the Yamal contract starting April 27.

events.name: Suspension of gas supplies
events.wd_description: PGNiG announced it would suspend gas supplies along the Yamal pipeline starting Wednesday morning.
events.description: PGNiG announced it would suspend gas supplies along the Yamal pipeline starting Wednesday morning.

events.name: Market reaction
events.wd_description: The news of the suspension sent US natural gas futures up about 3% on Tuesday.
events.description: The news of the suspension sent US natural gas futures up about 3% on Tuesday.
